function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid sharing of molecular data may lead to unintentional release of sensitive information.","Impact":"Revealing sensitive data may result in privacy violations and misuse of information.","Mitigation":"Implement data privacy and security measures, limit access to sensitive data, and provide secure platforms for data sharing.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, access controls, secure communication channels.","People":"Researchers, medical professionals, patients.","Owner":"Data scientists, IT professionals, data privacy experts."},{"Description":"Inadequate data collection and efforts may lead to ineffective management of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Ineffective management can result in the continued spread of disease and increased public health risk.","Mitigation":"Improve data collection methods, enhance surveillance systems, and strengthen public health interventions.","Technologies":"Data tracking and analytics, surveillance technology, public health information systems.","People":"Government agencies, public health organizations, medical researchers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, medical research institutions."},{"Description":"Existing technological, sociological, and operational barriers may hinder the impact of digital-health technologies.","Impact":"Barriers can limit the effectiveness of digital-health tools in managing pandemics and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Address technological barriers, improve user acceptance, and optimize operational workflows for digital-health technologies.","Technologies":"User-friendly digital platforms, technology integration, stakeholder engagement tools.","People":"Healthcare providers, technology developers, public health administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies, public health agencies."}]}
